problem.markdown:
>>For a given load, P, if the cross-sectional area, A, of a column is reduced by a factor of 2, what will happen to the compressive stress in the column?<<
(x) It will double ( ) It will decrease by a factor of 2 ( ) It will increase by a factor of 4 ( ) It will decrease by a factor of 4
[explanation] Explanation: If the cross-sectional area is reduced by a factor of 2 the stress will increase by a factor of 2 since stress equals force divided by area. [explanation]
